post.summary: Enrolls user or group into a Course
post.description:
It is possible to enroll user as well as group by using userLoginName parameter with an appropriate Id. When API Key authorization is used userLoginName parameter is required. If userLoginName parameter is not specified current user login name will be used.
            Parameter userLoginName stands for Login name of user or group that enrollment is related to.
            Authorized with API Key and Course Administrators can enroll any user or group in a course, others can enroll only themselves.
            Created Enrollment is returned when user is enrolled.No Content is returned when group is enrolled.
            Teachers can enroll any user in a course, others can enroll only themselves.
            CourseSessionId parameter is deprecated, use CourseSessionIds instead.
            If CourseSessionIds parameter is not specified for single-session or multiple-session based courses user should visit the course home page to select a session.

post.summary: Unenrolls user or group from a Course
post.description:
It is possible to unenroll user as well as group by using userLoginName parameter with an appropriate value. When API Key authorization is used userLoginName parameter is required. If userLoginName parameter is not specified current user login name will be used.
            Parameter userLoginName stands for Login name of user or group that enrollment is related to.
            Authorized with API Key and Course Administrators can unenroll any user or group from a course, others can unenroll only themselves.
            Unenroll only affects enrollments with statuses Active and Awaiting.

post.description:
Only enrollments with statuses Active and Awaiting can be cancelled.
            If current user is a learner in a course, only their own enrollment can be cancelled.

If current user is a learner in a course, only their own enrollment can be retaken.
            CourseSessionId parameter is deprecated, use CourseSessionIds instead.

Allowed for learners enrolled via AD group into course with option 'Enroll user into a single course session'/'Enroll user into multiple course sessions' only.
            CourseSessionId parameter is deprecated, use CourseSessionIds instead.

post.summary: Creates a new group based on the provided model
post.description:
If the group already exists in a deleted state, the group will be synchronized and updated.
Returns `200 OK` with the created group, or a validation error if the request is invalid.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
The required and supported fields depend on the `UserSource`:
`AzureAD`. `ExternalId` is required. Group is created from Active Directory. Additionally, group members can be created and added to a group.
`Internal` or Unspecified. `Title` is required. Group is created from provided fields.

patch.summary: Updates the proxy manager assignment for the specified ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the proxy manager assignment to update.

post.summary: Creates a new user based on the provided model
post.description:
If the user already exists in a deleted state (except for AzureB2C), the user will be synchronized and updated.
Returns `200 OK` with the created user, or a validation error if the request is invalid.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
The required and supported fields depend on the `UserSource`:
`AzureAD`. `ExternalId` or `Email` is required. User is created from Active Directory. Additionally, `Title` may be provided and applied if the user could not be resolved from Active Directory.
`AzureB2C`. `Title` and `SignInType` are required. Depending on `SignInType` - `Email`, `Phone` or `Username` may be required.
`Internal`. `Title` and `Email` are required. User is created from provided fields. 
Unspecified. `Email` is required. User is created from any of the existing sources if exists, if not - internal user is created.

delete.description: The user will be deleted from AzureB2C if applicable

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the user

Disables user account (currently supported only for Flow365 users)
Resets the password for a user (supported only for Flow365 users)

Roles.description: User roles that receive the notification

CourseId.description: Id of course that enrollment is related to

UserId.description: Id of user that enrollment is related to

UserLoginName.description: Login name of user that enrollment is related to

CertificateId.description: Id of certificate that was acquired within this enrollment

CEU.description: Continuing education units that were earned within this enrollment

IsImported.description: Identifies whether user progress was imported

DecimalCEU.description: Continuing education units that were earner within this enrollment as decimal

DueDate.description: Due Date, if configured for course

EndDate.description: End Date, if configured for course

CanUnenroll.description: Can learner cancel enrollment or not

CancellationReason.description: Reason why enrollment was cancelled. Filled by learner or teacher.

CreatedByUserId.description: Id of user that created this enrollment

QuizUserStatuses.description: List of quiz progress statuses for user within this enrollment

ScormUserStatuses.description: List of scorm progress statuses for user within this enrollment

LearningModuleUserStatuses.description: List of learning module progress statuses for user within this enrollment

ExternalAppUserStatuses.description: List of external app progress statuses for user within this enrollment

ExternalContentUserStatuses.description: List of external content progress statuses for user within this enrollment

Attendances.description: List of attendances for user within this enrollment

AssignmentTasks.description: List of assignment tasks for user within this enrollment

AssessmentUserStatuses.description: List of assessment progress statuses for user within this enrollment

CourseSessions.description: List of Course Sessions related to the enrollment

AllCourseSessions.description: List of All Course Sessions related to the enrollment that includes sessions from EnrollToAll ILT

CourseId.description: Id of course that enrollment request is related to

UserLoginName.description: Login name of user that enrollment request is related to

RejectMessage.description: Reason why enrollment request was reject or cancelled

CourseSessions.description: List of Course Sessions related to the enrollment request

CourseId.description: Id of Course that this external app is related to

ConsumerKey.description: The consumer key used by the tool

Secret.description: The secret used by the tool. This value is not filled for GET queries due to security reason

OriginalExternalAppId.description:
OriginalExternalAppId is used to get the original external app when a course is copied
            That way we can copy the "Secret" property to the new external app

CustomFields.description: Custom fields that will be sent to the tool provider

Privacy.description: What information to send to the external tool

NewWindow.description: Determines how the external tool will be opened. True - open in new window, False - open in iframe

Order.description: Order of External App within the course

UserStatuses.description: List of user progress statuses for this external app

CourseId.description: Id of Course that group of sessions is related to

EnrollmentDeadline.description: Enrollment Deadline for group of sessions

Enrollments.description: List of enrollments associated with group of sessions

CourseId.description: Id of course that learning module is related to

UserStatuses.description: List of users progress statuses for this learning module. If current user is learner only their status will be visible

IsPublished.description: Is learning module published or not

Order.description: Order of Learning Module within the course

HasPrerequisite.description: Has Learning Module some prerequisite or not

Items.description:
JSON string with array of LM items
            https://api.365.systems/Documentation/html/types.html#learning-module-configuration

LearningModuleId.description: Id of learning module that status is related to

EnrollmentId.description: Id of enrollment that status is related to

AttemptsCount.description: Number of attempts that was done by user

QuestionPools.description: List of Question Pools where this category is used

MaxAttemptsLimit.description: Max possible number of attempts for this quiz

PassingPercentage.description: Percentage that user needs to get to pass this quiz

AllowReview.description: Allow learner to review their attempt after completion or not

AllowNavigation.description: Allow learner to navigate between questions during passing quiz

TimeLimit.description: Max attempt time limit, in seconds

ShowTimer.description: Show timer in quiz player or not

UserStatuses.description: List of users progress statuses for this quiz. If current user is learner only their status will be visible

Courses.description: List of courses that quiz is associated with

QuizQuestionPools.description: List of question pools that quiz is associated with

QuizId.description: Id of quiz that status is related to

EnrollmentId.description: Id of enrollment that status is related to

AttemptsCount.description: Number of attempts that was done by user

UserStatuses.description: List of users progress statuses for this quiz. If current user is learner only their status will be visible

Courses.description: List of courses that this scorm in associated with

ScormId.description: Id of scorm that status is related to

EnrollmentId.description: Id of enrollment that status is related to

AttemptsCount.description: Number of attempts that was done by user

CourseCatalogId.description: Id of Course Catalog that course is related to

Phone.description: User's phone number (currently available only for B2C users)

IsExternal.description: Determines if user is external for current tenant

IsDisabled.description: Determines if user is disabled (currently supported only for Flow365 users).

IsDeleted.description: Determines if user is deleted. The user is marked as deleted when his record in Azure AD is deleted or marked as inactive.

IsProxyManager.description: Determines if user is proxy manager.

UserSource.description: User source (Azure AD or Azure B2C)

Enrollments.description: List of user enrollments. Available only for current user

EnrollmentRequests.description: List of user enrollment requests. Available only for current user

Certificates.description: List of user certificates. Available only for current user

Competencies.description: List of user competencies (skills). Available only for current user

UserId.description: Id of user that certificate is related to

CompetencyId.description: Id of competency (skill) is related to

LevelId.description: Id of competency (skill) level is related to

ModifiedByUserId.description: User id that revocation is related to

CreatedByUserId.description: User id that achievement is related to

EnrollmentId.description: Id of enrollment is related to

CourseId.description: Id of Course that request is related to

UserId.description: Id of user added to the waiting list

CourseSessionId.description: Id of Course Session that request is related to

CreatedAt.description: Date and Time of creation request

modifiedAt.description: When the category was last modified
When the skill was last modified

isDefault.description: Default skill level set or not

skills.description: Skills where the skill level set is used

modifiedAt.description: When the skill level set was last modified

scaleSetId.description: Competency scale set (skill level set) id

modifiedAt.description: When the skill level was last modified
When the skill tag was last modified

userField.description: User field to apply the condition over

value.description: Value to compare the fields with

modifiedAt.description: When the target skill condition was last modified

isGlobal.description: If the target skill applies globally for all users

conditions.description: Conditions to apply over user fields

rules.description: Minimum skills and skill levels needed for target skill

modifiedAt.description: When the target skill was last modified

skillLevelId.description: Minimum level required to meet the target skill

modifiedAt.description: When the target skill rule was last modified

userIds.description: List of User Ids to get the target skills for

modifiedAt.description: When the user skill was last modified
